course_title: Intermediate Print Media III: Interdisciplinary Approaches to Image Production

sections.comments: Pre-req: one of VISA 220, VISA 250. VISA 352 001 will be delivered with some online and some in-person components at the UBC Vancouver campus (adhering to physical distancing and health requirements). If registration for this class is blocked, then it is full and you should register on the corresponding waitlist. Students will be periodically moved from the waitlist into the class as seats become available, and notified of their registration via email.VISA 352-001 provides a dynamic blend of lithography, drawing, and related digital printmaking technologies, meshed with an exploration of contemporary print concepts and theory. Editioned lithographs, drawings, and monoprints will be completed.
sections.building: Ponderosa Commons East - Audain Art Centre/Spruce

sections.comments: VISA 352 01W is a waitlist for VISA 352 001. Pre-req: one of VISA 220, VISA 250. Students who do not have the appropriate pre-requisite will be de-registered.Students will be moved from the waitlist into the class, space permitting, in order of registration date. While we hope to accommodate all interested students in this class, please be aware that being registered on the waitlist does not guarantee you will obtain a seat.

description: Lithographic printing; suitable for students interested in drawing and print media interface in context of contemporary art; related digital and photographic technologies employed.
